summary: E-commerce app with Shop Now flow; needs a visible admin UI for product management and redeployment after a deployment error.
architectural_notes: Admin section should include a discoverable entry point (e.g., Admin link in navigation) and dedicated admin routes/pages.
Admin area access should be protected by Google authentication and limited to a single allowed email (grandzbee@gmail.com).

existing_features.title: Make the admin area discoverable in the UI by adding a clearly visible navigation entry that routes to /admin, even when the current user is not an admin (the page must still be protected by the admin guard).

Update user-facing admin-access messaging to reflect the actual authentication model: users must sign in with Internet Identity, and only the Internet Identity that is linked to Google account grandzbee@gmail.com is permitted as admin.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create visible admin UI (nav link + admin route/pages) to manage products (CRUD)
Restrict admin access via Google account login; allow admin only for grandzbee@gmail.com

Enforce admin access based on an allowlist of Internet Identity principals, and provide a backend mechanism for a canister controller to add the admin principal corresponding to the Internet Identity that is linked to Google account grandzbee@gmail.com.

projectName: Create visible Admin UI for product management and restrict access to grandzbee@gmail.com (via Internet Identity principal allowlist)
